means: 一般认定的，推定的，假定存在的

sentence.Network_en: the putative father of this child
There have been many attempts to track down the putative Loch Ness monster.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们为追踪假定存在的尼斯湖水怪做了许多努力。

sentence.Network_en: According to Mike Brewer of the IFS, this putative new category has little validity.
sentence.Network_cn: 伦敦财政研究所的MikeBrewer认为这个新出现的定义并没有实际意义.

PerfectNetExp.abs: putamina 核putative 想象的putatively 推定地
在集团诉讼请求阶段,作为原告的“集团”仅仅是起诉人推定的(putative)产物, 在完成集团诉讼证明程序了集团的范围之前,集团仅仅是“推定的集团” 。推定的集团.
说话2_英语学习教室_新浪博客 ... grant v. 同意给予 putative adj. 公认的，普遍认为的 rapport n. 意见一致，和睦.

list.abs: 初中英语短语大全 ... 65．brush one's teeth 刷牙 67．put on 穿上，戴上 68．take off 脱下，摘下.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... put to (船只顺避风等而)靠岸 put up 举起；安装；张贴 put up with 忍受，容忍(讨厌的人).
大学英语四级常用词组 ... put down 记下；镇压；杀死 put forward 提出(要求、事实等) put in 花费；正式提出.
九年级英语单词表 ... advertisement 广告 put off 推迟；延迟 set up 创建；开办.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French putatif, -ive or late Latin putativus, from Latin putat- 'thought', from the verb putare

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as putative, you mean that they are generally thought to be the thing mentioned.

means.word_mean: 1. commonly put forth or accepted as true on inconclusive grounds;

sentences.sentence: "the reputed (or purported) author of the book"

auth_sentence.content: Your putative red blood cells have a nucleus.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your putative red blood cells have a nucleus.

auth_sentence.content: Many counter-narratives revolve around her putative misbehavior.
